Thickness Mapping System Request for Proposal
=========================
**Reference Number**: WS3821570983-Doc3866916323
**Amendment Number**: 3
**Publication Date**: February 10, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: March 7, 2023, 14:00 EST

**Rationale and Requirements**
---------------------------

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) is seeking a Thickness Mapping System to meet its research and development needs. The system must be delivered to Ottawa, ON within 20 weeks of contract award.

**Supply Arrangement**
--------------------

The procurement will be conducted using a competitive bidding process in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.

**Contracting Entity and End User**
--------------------------------

The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the NRC. The end user is the NRC.

**Contact Information**
-------------------

For more information, please contact Adriana Gonzalez at adriana.gonzalez2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Notice and Bidding**
-------------------

A request for proposal has been posted on the Ariba Discovery website http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15385540?extsite=MTUzODU1NDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==. Bidders are required to submit all supporting documentation and bids electronically. The Ariba Discovery posting and CanadaBuys posting closing time have been amended to March 7, 2023, 14:00 EST. Late bids will be rejected.

**Mandatory Requirements**
-------------------------

Bidders must meet the mandatory requirements detailed in the Request for Proposal.

**Attachments**
--------------

None. 
**Trade Agreements**
-----------------

The procurement is covered by the following trade agreements:

- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
**Procurement Category**
------------------------

The procurement category is Goods (GD)

**Procurement Method**
----------------------

The procurement method is Competitive - Traditional
